menu
Science
and
Creativity
go hand in hand
arrow_downward
Improv requires you to understand group dynamics, tell stories, and say yes in the face of the unknown. In many ways, improv draws upon the very same skills we cultivate as science and tech professionals. This beginner-friendly improv workshop will use the tools of this trade to help you become a better collaborator, better storyteller, and better equipped to handle the unknowns of a career in science or technology.

Subscribe to the STEMprov mailing list for more information:

STEMprov 2021 | Nichole Lynn Bennett
